original_text: This is something that I want you to know: Christ has authority over every man, as his head. Also, the head of a woman is her husband. And the head of Christ is God.
korean_text: 그러나 나는 너희가 알기를 원하노니 각 남자의 머리는 그리스도요 여자의 머리는 남자요 그리스도의 머리는 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: This is something that I want you to know
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내가 너희가 알기를 원하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Christ has authority over every man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도는 모든 사람 위에 권위를 가집니다

sentences.original_text: Also, the head of a woman is her husband
And the head of Christ is God
